subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A rookie general manager, Ryan McDonough, and coach, Jeff Hornacek, have created a winning spirit around the Suns, who were projected to win only about 20 games this season.
snippet: A rookie general manager, Ryan McDonough, and coach, Jeff Hornacek, have created a winning spirit around the Suns, who were projected to win only about 20 games this season.
